attributes.action: Stop prying into our private lives
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Stay out of our prviate lives and stop 
banning things YOU do not approve of.
We are living longer and have a right to live our lives and make our own decisions.
NO BANS, there is little enough pleasure right now. the ban creates misery and anger, I smoke, Living kills.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
